scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:datetimepicker && npm run build:select && npm run build:switch && npm run build:typeahead
scripts.clean: rimraf dist tests **/tsdoc-metadata.json core/**/*.d.ts core/**/*.d.ts.map datetimepicker/**/*.d.ts datetimepicker/**/*.d.ts.map select/**/*.d.ts select/**/*.d.ts.map switch/**/*.d.ts switch/**/*.d.ts.map typeahead/**/*.d.ts typeahead/**/*.d.ts.map */*.metadata.json ./*.metadata.json ./*.d.ts ./*d.ts.map */dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run bundle && npm run version:placeholder && npm run version:git
scripts.postpublish: npm run doc && npm run version:placeholder && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run clean:duplicates
scripts.doc: path-exists docs && npm run doc:generate || echo "No docs generated!"
scripts.doc:generate: npm run doc:generate:core && npm run doc:generate:datetimepicker && npm run doc:generate:select && npm run doc:generate:switch && npm run doc:generate:typeahead && npm run doc:save
scripts.doc:save: cd docs && git add . && git commit -m "INT: updated API docs ng-bootstrap" && git push && cd ..
scripts.doc:generate:core: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-core && npm run doc:json:core && npm run doc:md:core
scripts.doc:md:core: api-documenter markdown -i core/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-core && rimraf core/temp
scripts.doc:generate:datetimepicker: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-datetimepicker && npm run doc:json:datetimepicker && npm run doc:md:datetimepicker
scripts.doc:md:datetimepicker: api-documenter markdown -i datetimepicker/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-datetimepicker && rimraf datetimepicker/temp
scripts.doc:generate:select: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-select && npm run doc:json:select && npm run doc:md:select
scripts.doc:md:select: api-documenter markdown -i select/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-select && rimraf select/temp
scripts.doc:generate:switch: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-switch && npm run doc:json:switch && npm run doc:md:switch
scripts.doc:md:switch: api-documenter markdown -i switch/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-switch && rimraf switch/temp
scripts.doc:generate:typeahead: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-typeahead && npm run doc:json:typeahead && npm run doc:md:typeahead
scripts.doc:md:typeahead: api-documenter markdown -i typeahead/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-typeahead && rimraf typeahead/temp
